phrases: Scars that just refuse to fade from memory
Sometimes the burdens too much for one to bear
Do Not give up on me, please do not turn me away
Ill hold your hand in mine
Will I lose my hold on her someday?
Will her smile fade in a flood of tears
Or can I keep the fears at bay?
Echoing, distant voices wither into silence.
But there is one thing that will never ever age
My love for you is timeless
Do Not ever say such things to me
All happenings Find meaning in the story
In time the clouds will clear away,
so just stay, please stay with me Whoa!
Who are we to pass through you?
That answer will find you someday
We cannot let them find us.
It cannot be Abarai cannot have lost.
His opponent seems to have gotten away.
No, first we must get Abarai treated.
We are taking him back to the barracks.
No, it is different with us.
With other Soul Reapers, their spiritual power is mostly for combat.
But those of us in Squad 4 have healing power as well.
Although that is about all we can do.
He took direct hits from a Zanpaku-to of a Lieutenant
Normally, he would have died instantly.
He has an unbelievable will to live.
I will heal him without fail.
I will heal him in one night.
When I found him, he was already in this condition.
If only I would found him sooner and assisted his fight.
In any case, I will contact Squad 4.
I will ask for emergency relief.
B-But Abarai fought Ryoka by himself.
If he entered a fight alone, defeat is absolutely forbidden.
I have no use for a fool who did not understand that.
Hinamori, let us follow his orders, and take Abarai to prison.
Why did he have to talk like thathuh?
He is as scary as ever the Captain of Squad 6.
Wow, Abarai got messed up pretty good.
Hey, hey I am a Captain, too.
And you are going to address me like that?
How come all you Captains creep around so silently?!
And why are you here anyway, Hitsugaya?!
But I am not sure about Kira, either.
The alarm sounds quite conveniently these days.
I do not understand just what you mean.
And you think you can get away with that?
Anyway, it will not hurt to be careful.
This means that we are short one Lieutenant
in the Thirteen Court Guard Squads.
We can no longer leave this to the lower-ranked members.
Therefore, in view of the situation,
I will not discipline Ichimaru for his independent actions earlier.
Furthermore, I will allow senior officers, including Lieutenants,
to carry their Zanpaku-to at all times
as well as allow full release of their Zanpaku-to in the Court, as in wartime.
Carry the Zanpaku-to all the time, huh?
Full release as in wartime, huh?
If someone had not allowed Ryoka to escape,
we would not be talking about this now.
Yes,'cuz he will be my prey from now.
Your wounds have not closed yet.
Chad and the others do not know where Rukia is.
If you go out in your condition, you are certain to die!
If I can knock him out like that, how can he be all right?
Sleep until you are healed, idiot!
Oh no he is got another wound now.
I stopped him, did not I?!
Do not complain about how I did it.
I did not think that the slash across his left shoulder and chest
I thought it would definitely be a fatal wound
To be able to stop Lieutenant Abarai's slash
This mask looks too much like a Hollow.
Can you tell me what is going on outside?
We do not know the details either.
But we have heard that Lieutenant Abarai was taken down.
I am done treating Lieutenant Abarai's wounds for today.
Why did you attack the Ryoka alone?
Does it have anything to do with Rukia?
You do not have to get so serious!
We cannot afford to get hurt practicing, you know!
Unless we are serious, practicing is useless.
You just did not pay attention.
Then I will be your opponent, next.
It is no fun beating a girl, is it?
Are you making fun of women?
Well, I was not thinking of you as an opponent,
but at least I will not be bored.
I will make you eat your words.
Special wartime orders were just announced.
First: All senior officers including Lieutenants
will be permitted to wear their swords at all times.
Second: They will be permitted to release their Zanpaku-to as in wartime.
Squad 1 Captain and Captain General of the 13 Court Guard Squads
Why did it come to this?
They do not have to let us carry Zanpaku-to.
Peace is all that I want.
What is it at this hour?
I know full well that this is very rude
but may I have a quick word?
I promise not to make any blunders.
Do you think I would turn you away simply for rudeness?
Do I seem so heartless these days?
Today was a very difficult day.
laying his hand on an injured man!
But I am glad Ganju was able to stop you earlier.
Otherwise, you would have started to bleed again.
I know I got to cool my head, huh?
It is better if you lie down for a bit longer.
No one will come after you here.
I wonder what happened to him that Renji?
Oh I am not really sure of the details
But he would normally be sent to emergency relief.
Did not you have something to talk about?
Oh his life is not in danger.
Do not worry about the captains' meeting.
Captain Kuchiki asked that Abarai be discharged,
but there were objections and so he backed off.
he will be able to return to his squad.
By chance, were you the one who objected, Captain Aizen?
He is an excellent officer and liked by everyone.
There is not one person in the Thirteen Court Guard Squads
who would rejoice at his dismissal.
I will not disturb you So may I sit here and watch you?
Stay as long as you like.
Geez, I wish the Captain would have waken me up.
I wonder if I will make it to the meeting on time?
There, I think I made it
It came from the Eastern Wall!
I looked up into the night sky and saw a comet
I want to see you right now, but I cannot fly
If I could become a comet
I would fly across the sky I am sure
I would circle the skies and shine over you
With this instantaneous light that will definitely reach you
If I could become a comet
I am sure I will always stay close to you
It is about the only thing I can do.
As long as we have Hanataro, you are fine.
So Ichigo, go and get all cut up.
